revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Phased zorch missile | class = PhaseZorchMissile | game = Chex }}[[Classes|Classes:]]{{Class|Actor}}→{{Class|PlasmaBall}}→PhaseZorchMissile
The shot fired by {{Class|PhasingZorcher|Phasing Zorcher}}, does the same amount of damage as shots from Doom's {{Class|PlasmaRifle|Plasma Rifle}}. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== Actor PhaseZorchMissile : {{Class|PlasmaBall}} { {{Property|RenderStyle}} Translucent {{Property|Obituary}} "$OB_MPPHASEZORCH" // "%o was phase zorched by %k." {{Property|Alpha}} 0.75 }
